oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Well-fuctioning home composters
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Korhonen, Anne
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In recent years, the Work Efficiency Institute (TTS) has compared thermal composters, regulating materials and compost accelerators and studied user's experiences on home composting by a questionnaire. The aim has been to produce information on composting, so that home composting can be made as easy as possible.
